author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign Guardian Build Guide - DEEP of NIGHT
In this Fextralife video, I want to show you guys my guardian build for the new Deep of Night mode in Nightreign. I think Guardian is probably one of the meta characters right now. He has just become so much better since the recent patch. He's gotten some really strong relics or Deep Relics in this update as well, which make him much more effective at dealing damage.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Nightreign Deep of Night Guardian Build
1:20 Guardian Buff
2:10 Guardian Relics
5:17 Guardian Deep Relics
8:40 Shield
10:07 Weapons
11:44 Weapon Passives
13:02 Other Relics
14:02 Final Thoughts
